thread.title: Asante Kotoko board setup recruitment committee to oversee player transfers
thread.title_full: Asante Kotoko board setup recruitment committee to oversee player transfers

title: Asante Kotoko board setup recruitment committee to oversee player transfers
text:
Sports News | 9 October 2015 18:10 CET Asante Kotoko board setup recruitment committee to oversee player transfers - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Asante Kotoko have set up a five-member recruitment committee to be headed by coach David Duncan, GHANAsoccernet.com can confirm. 
The decision to set up the recruitment committee was taken at a meeting of the club's board of directors on Friday. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
